did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: First Baptist Church of Cortland records, 1801-1876.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: First Baptist Church of Cortland (Cortland, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Original records includes minutes, a manuscript history of the church, a membership list, an agreement as to a bequest by James Duane Squiers, and an indenture. Also a "Manual of the First Baptist Church", the minutes of the sixty-fourth anniversary of the Cortland Baptist Association and minutes of the Baptist missionary society. Microfilmed records include minutes, lists of members, Articles of the Baptist Church, and Church Covenant. Also records of the Baptist Church of Cortlandville, N.Y.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Original records includes minutes, a manuscript history of the church by Asa Starr, a membership list, an agreement as to a bequest by James Duane Squiers, and and indenture. Also a "Manual of the First Baptist Church" (1880), the minutes of the sixty-fourth anniversary of the Cortland Baptist Association (1891) and manuscript minutes of the Baptist missionary society (1884-1891).
Microfilmed records include minutes, lists of members, Articles of the Baptist Church, and Church Covenant. Also records of the Baptist Church of Cortlandville, N.Y.
